text:
The Board of Supervisors of the City and County of San Francisco has complete discretion and authority to terminate SSIP at any time, for any reason. In the event that SSIP is terminated, all SSIP applicants and recipients shall be eligible to apply for General Assistance, PAES OR CALM, whichever is applicable, in accordance with the rules and regulations of those programs. 
(Added by Ord. 151-98, App. 5/8/98)
